title.rendered: Summer Kosel: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Summer Kosel
    • Early Life
    • Professional Career
    • Horses
  • Summer Kosel’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Husband
    • How Old is Summer Kosel?
    • What is her nationality?
    • FAQs About Summer Kosel 

Summer Kosel is a professional barrel racer and rodeo contestant from Glenham, South Dakota. Known for her exceptional skills and dedication to the sport, Kosel has made a significant impact in the world of rodeo, particularly in barrel racing. She is recognized for her partnership with her horse, Apollo, with whom she has broken records and won numerous competitions. Kosel’s career is marked by her commitment to her family, her faith, and her love for the sport of rodeo.

Here we have Summer Kosel’s net worth, career earnings, professional career, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Summer Kosel

Summer Kosel hails from Glenham, South Dakota, where she lives with her husband, Kevin, and their four children. 

The couple runs a family ranch and a stock contracting business, Smokin Guns Rodeo Production, which organizes amateur rodeos in South Dakota. Kosel’s life revolves around her family and her passion for rodeo, with her children also participating in the sport.

Kosel’s journey in rodeo began at a young age, as her father raised racehorses. She was around horses most of her life, and after a brief period away from the sport to pursue other interests, she returned to barrel racing after starting her family.

Today, she is a prominent figure in the rodeo world, known for her talent, dedication, and the strong bond she shares with her horse, Apollo.

Early Life

Growing up, Summer Kosel was introduced to horses and rodeo by her father, who raised racehorses. She was riding horses even before she could walk, and her early life was deeply intertwined with these majestic animals. 

However, she took a break from the sport to pursue other interests, including a desire to be a singer and dancer. It was only after she got married and started a family that horses and barrel racing reentered her life.

Professional Career

Summer Kosel is a professional barrel racer from Glenham, South Dakota. She has been involved with horses since her childhood, as her father raised racehorses. 

After getting married and starting a family, she returned to barrel racing, a sport she had been involved in all her life. Kosel joined the Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA) in 2017.

She has had significant success in her career, with major wins in 2023 at events such as RodeoHouston, San Angelo Stock Show & Rodeo, Red Bluff Round-Up, Guymon Pioneer Days, Cheyenne Frontier Days, Dodge City Round-Up, and the Governor’s Cup Rodeo.

A significant part of Kosel’s success can be attributed to her horse, Apollo, also known as FirewaterFrenchFame. Apollo was initially intended to be a rope horse by his previous owners, but a friend started him on the barrel pattern before Kosel purchased him.

Together, they have broken records, including at the 2022 Cheyenne Frontier Days, where they set a new arena record.

Despite her professional commitments, Kosel is also a dedicated mother to four girls, who also compete in rodeo. She and her husband, Kevin, a former bull rider, run a stock contracting company and ranch. 

As of 2023, Kosel is a 1-time Wrangler National Finals Rodeo Qualifier and started the 2023 NFR in 9th place.

Horses

Summer Kosel’s professional career in rodeo is marked by her partnership with her horse, Apollo, also known as FirewaterFrenchFame. Apollo, a chestnut gelding, was initially intended to be a rope horse by his previous owners.

Kosel and Apollo have won over $115,000 in 2023, including go-round wins at some of the big shows: Houston, Ft. Worth, Clovis, California, Guymon, Oklahoma, and Cheyenne Frontier Days.

Summer Kosel’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Summer Kosel’s net worth is estimated to be $1 million.

As of November 2023, her earnings from rodeo competitions alone amount to $115,681.61.

Career Earnings

In 2023, Summer Kosel earned significant prize money from various rodeos. Some of her major wins include RodeoHouston ($8,250), San Angelo Stock Show & Rodeo ($6,581), Red Bluff Round-Up ($5,941), Guymon Pioneer Days ($6,256), Cheyenne Frontier Days ($15,442), Dodge City Round-Up ($11,80), and Governor’s Cup Rodeo ($14,500).

Personal Details

Husband

Summer Kosel is married to Kevin Kosel. Together, they run a family ranch and a stock contracting business, Smokin Guns Rodeo Production.

How Old is Summer Kosel?

As of 2023, she is 37 years old.

What is her nationality?

She is American.

FAQs About Summer Kosel 

Who is Summer Kosel?

Summer Kosel is a professional barrel racer and rodeo contestant.

What are some of her major wins?

Some of her major wins in 2023 include RodeoHouston, San Angelo Stock Show & Rodeo, Red Bluff Round-Up, Guymon Pioneer Days, Cheyenne Frontier Days, Dodge City Round-Up, and Governor’s Cup Rodeo.

Who is her husband?

She is married to Kevin Kosel.
